item.title: Need help on drop - Flyzilla [future bass/house]
item.dc:creator: Bastyon
item.description:
Hey guys . I was making this track and I came across a problem . I think that the flutter/wub things collide with the spray saw chords in the drop. I also suck quite a lot at drops so it would be greatly appreciated if someone could help me out.
Here is the project link https://app.auxy.co/projects/PYQANvk3I_edBjmkmLVbbg==
Thanks
